entities.name: fudge
entities.description: Fudge is the main character and a person who wants to cooperate peacefully with the guardians of gold. He has an ambition to seize control of goblin gold supplies.

relationships.description: Fudge's dearest ambition is to seize control of the goblin gold supplies.
Cornelius 'Goblin-Crusher' Fudge, that's what his friends call him
Sources close to the Minister have recently disclosed that Fudge's dearest ambition is to seize control of the goblin gold supplies.
